description: Gets information about one or more repositories.

nested_items.name: repositories
nested_items.description: Lists the repositories called by the list repositories operation.

nested_items.name: repositoryName
nested_items.description: The name associated with the repository.

nested_items.name: repositoryId
nested_items.description: The ID associated with the repository.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: An enumeration token that allows the operation to batch the results of the operation. Batch sizes are 1,000 for list repository operations. When the client sends the token back to CodeCommit, another page of 1,000 records is retrieved.
